Pro:
* Nice very skill based Gameplay
* somewhat nice atmosphere
* nice balancing

Cons:
* Bad graphics
* Pretty toxic community but you learn to live with it
* Hackers everyhwere, on all Ranks/Elos and in almost every game. Right now every 2nd game one of my opponents or teammates gets a VAC ban after the match. Doesnt matter if I play on MGE or Global Elite. There are hackers in almost every match you play, there is no working elo system anymore. Sometimes you will just get unranked because too many players got banned and your elo cannot be assessed.
Even with 2000 hrs playtime, prime and operation premium matchmaking you get matched with turkish level 0 accounts with no inventory or friends and spin bot and wallhack on. Same seems to go for faceit and esea, not so dramatic though. Even the pro scene has increasing hacker problems.

After 10 years of only counter strike, I am starting to say goodbye to the hackers and play other games..
